comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/manolas478>@manolas478</denchmark-link> did you install armadillo via the package manager or did you build armadillo manually? Also can you provide some additional system related informations as mentioned in the bug template: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/blob/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/0-bug.md>https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/blob/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/0-bug.md</denchmark-link>

I did face similar issue, it is because of armadillo and hdf5 error. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/manolas478>@manolas478</denchmark-link> You will be encountering the same issue when you compile a test armadillo code also. So I would request you to updated the LD_LIBRARY_PATH variable in locate the lib folder with the libhdf5.so.10 file and add the corresponding lib folder path to as explained in the <denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49435688/error-compiling-armadillo-c-library-on-ubuntu-16-04>Link </denchmark-link>
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zoq>@zoq</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nappaillav>@nappaillav</denchmark-link> . The issue is solved.
